titles.title: Asian Carp Prevention and Control Act
Asian Carp Prevention and Control Act
Asian Carp Prevention and Control Act
Asian Carp Prevention and Control Act
Asian Carp Prevention and Control Act
A bill to amend section 42 of title 18, United States Code, to prohibit the importation and shipment of certain species of carp.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Environment and Public Works.
Committee on Environment and Public Works Subcommittee on Water and Wildlife. Hearings held.

committee.name: Committee on Environment and Public Works

calendar.text: Committee on Environment and Public Works. Ordered to be reported without amendment favorably.

committee.name: Committee on Environment and Public Works

action.text: Committee on Environment and Public Works. Reported by Senator Boxer without amendment. With written report No. 111-181.

calendar.text: Placed on Senate Legislative Calendar under General Orders. Calendar No. 366.

vote.text: Passed Senate without amendment by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Message on Senate action sent to the House.
Mr. Conyers moved to suspend the rules and pass the bill.
Considered under suspension of the rules.
DEBATE - The House proceeded with forty minutes of debate on S. 1421.

vote.text: On motion to suspend the rules and pass the bill Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: Motion to reconsider laid on the table Agreed to without objection.

bill.summary: 12/14/2010--Public Law. (This measure has not been amended since it was introduced. The summary of that version is repeated here.) Asian Carp Prevention and Control Act - Amends the Lacey Act to add the bighead carp of the species Hypophthalmichthys nobilis to the list of injurious species that are prohibited from being shipped or imported into the United States.
